Biographies

  • Method Man & Redman biography

    Clifford Smith (born 2 March 1971) AKA Method Man and Reginald "Reggie" Noble (born 17 April 1970) AKA Redman are a East coast Hip-Hop and occasional comedy duo hailing from New York and New Jersey respectively.

    Read more
  • Dilated Peoples biography

    Dilated Peoples are an American hip hop trio from Los Angeles, California consisting of Evidence, DJ Babu, and Raka Iriscience.

    Read more
  • Xzibit biography

    Xzibit (born September 18, 1974) is the stage name of American rapper and TV personality, Alvin Joiner, originally hailing from Detroit, Michigan, U.S.

    Read more
  • Kurupt biography

    First and foremost Kurupt is an American hip-hop artist, but he is also an actor, an entrepreneur, and formerly an Executive Vice President of Death Row Records. In addition to his career as a solo rap artist he is one …
